item.title: [Pycon 2008] Linky linky
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description:
Here's my notes on Pycon this year. I'm going to throw out a collection of links that may or may not be useful to you. If you weren't able to make the conference, hopefully this list contains a link or two that are new or interesting to you.

item.description:

Face time with virtual friends - Some people/IT shops invest in established technology provided by big vendors. I've been somewhat disenchanted by the products (and underly

item.title: [Pycon 2008] Managing complexity slides
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Pycon has been real fun so far. The slides from my talk, Managing Complexity can be found here (complexitypycon2008.pdf). Will try and post thoughts and links thus far sooner (or later).
